question.title: Scichart VerticalLineAnnotation.Visibility = Visibility.Hidden not taking effect
question.body:
I'm having a problem with VerticalLineAnnotation.Visibility = Visibility.Hidden; not taking effect in my development, checking the Scichart forums I know the answer, Visibility is used internally but when I use Visibility = Visibility.Hidden in the button click event it takes effect.

I set VerticalLineAnnotation.Visibility = Visibility.Hidden did not take effect, in the button event Visibility.Hidden will take effect

Please tell me why. Thank you.

public partial class MainWindow : Window
{
    VerticalLineAnnotation verticalLine = new VerticalLineAnnotation();
    public MainWindow()
    {
        InitializeComponent();
        verticalLine.X1 = 2;
        verticalLine.IsEnabled = true;
        verticalLine.Visibility = Visibility.Hidden; // not yet in force
        sciChart.Annotations.Add(verticalLine);
        //verticalLine.IsHidden = false;
    }

    private void Button_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        verticalLine.Visibility = Visibility.Hidden; // go into effect
    }
}
